Introducing Biometra – the cutting-edge web3 wallet redefining secure and seamless access to your digital assets and the decentralized web.

At Biometra, we are on the forefront of innovation, currently in the testing phases of our revolutionary web3 wallet. Our platform empowers users with swift and secure interactions with the decentralized web, offering a hassle-free experience for managing digital assets.

Exciting developments await as we gear up for the release of version 2.0.0, which will introduce an advanced biometric authentication feature. Our dedicated team is actively working to implement this highly anticipated feature, ensuring its seamless integration and readiness for production.

With Biometra, you can effortlessly send Ethereum, Avalanche & Binance from one wallet to another in a matter of seconds. Not only is Biometra cross chain and perform exceptionally, but it also boasts a stunning UX/UI design, making navigation a breeze while displaying tokens and NFTs in all their glory.

Getting started with Biometra is a breeze. Create your wallet effortlessly by generating a seed phrase, enabling you to embark on your journey promptly. Log in securely with your seed phrase from Biometra, or any other wallet in the Web3 ecosystem and dive right into the exciting world of decentralized finance and digital assets.

Experience the future of web3 wallets with Biometra – secure, convenient, and ready to redefine your interaction with the decentralized web.
